headline: Disney's new ESPN streaming service has arrived, ushering in new era for sports and the cable bundle
summary: Disney’s long-awaited ESPN streaming launch marks the end of cable’s last anchor, signaling a new era where live sports, led by the NFL, are shifting to a fragmented, streaming-first future.
